name: Wraith Bear
description: A large, spectral bear that embodies chaos, with a menacing appearance rooted in its status as an undead creature.
memorable: The Wraith Bear's ability to drain life and regenerate health makes it a terrifying encounter.
goals: To drain the life from living beings and assert dominance in its territory.
relations: Typically solitary, but may be related to undead entities or cursed creatures.
environment: Often found in murky, cursed woods or battlefields where life has been drained.
strengths: Regenerates health from nearby living plants and can incapacitate with its roar.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to silvered weapons and magical attacks, alongside being affected by certain spells.
attacks: Life Drain attack that deals significant necrotic damage and reduces maximum Hit Points.
most_powerful_ability: Baleful Roar can incapacitate multiple foes, swaying the tide of battle.
senses: Possesses keen perception with a passive score of 17, allowing it to detect nearby threats effectively.
skills: Skilled in perception and survival, making it a dangerous predator.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic and poison damage
Condition immunity to charm and paralysis
Can move through objects as difficult terrain
Life drain potentially reduces maximum Hit Points
test_queries: large undead bear with life-draining abilities
terrifying spectral bear found in cursed woods
chaotic necrotic creature capable of regeneration
bear that can incapacitate enemies with roar
undead that drains life and flies through walls
